quotes: Spend eighty percent of your time focusing on the opportunities of tomorrow rather than the problems of yesterday.
Focus on how far you have come in life rather than looking at the accomplishments of others.
When you consider things like the stars, our affairs don't seem to matter very much, do they?
If you want work well done, select a busy man; the other kind has no time.
Our anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strengths.
Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
The best dreams happen when you're awake.
A tiger doesn't lose sleep over the opinion of sheep.
This is such a short and precious life that it's really important that you don't spend it being unhappy.
Your home is where your thoughts find peace.
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
The power to make and break habits and learning how to do that is really important.
When it hurts - observe. Life is trying to teach you something.
Life is like stepping onto a boat which is about to sail out to sea and sink.
Some men see things as they are and ask why. Others dream things that never were and ask why not.
We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
Pain doesn't last. And when it's gone, we have something to show for it. Growth.
Everything is created twice, first in the mind and then in reality.
The score never interested me, only the game.
Live your life as an exclamation rather than an explanation.
To arrive at the simplest truth requires years of contemplation.
Trust, like the soul, never returns once it is gone.
Eighty percent of success is showing up.
Identify your problems, but give your power and energy to solutions.
When people are free to do as they please, they usually imitate each other.
We become what we believe.
Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.
The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work.
Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
The truly rich men are the ones who have health, loved ones and a work they love.
No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place.
Having lots of money while not having inner peace is like dying of thirst while bathing in the ocean.
Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and got to work.
You change the world by being yourself.
Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
The whole problem with the world is the fools and fanatics are always so sure of themselves, and wiser people are full of doubts.
Leave the beaten track behind occasionally and dive into the woods. Every time you do you will be certain to find something you have never seen before.
A thing constructed can only be loved after it is constructed; but a thing created is loved before it exists.
I skate to where the puck is going to be, not where it has been.
An ounce of performance is worth pounds of promises.
Receive without complaint, Work with fate.
Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
The power of man has grown in every sphere, except over himself.
But better die than live mechanically a life that is a repetition of repetitions.
We must create our own world or we will die from inaction.
Either you run the day or the day runs you.
Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet.
Be strong. Be confident. Be the star of your own life.
